directions: In a large shallow dish stir together all ingredients except fish until combined well and add fish. Marinate fish, covered and chilled, turning occasionally, at least 1 hour and up to 2.
Grill fish on an oiled rack set 5 to 6 inches over glowing coals about 5 minutes on each side for medium-rare, or until desired doneness. (Alternatively, fish may be broiled.)
ingredients: a 1-inch piece fresh gingerroot, peeled and chopped fine
a pinch dried hot red pepper flakes, or to taste
title: Grilled Marinated Tuna Steaks Rau
